revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WG302 |revision=v1 |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Z-Com |manuf_model=WG-3220 |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |fcc_date=11/18/2003 |fcc_id=PY3WG302, PY3WAG302 |ic_id=4054A-WG302 |pcb_id=70-510302-05 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422B;FWIXP422BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620HCT-H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-621 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5212A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=RedBoot |stock_os=Linux;2.4.18;mvl30; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.0.228 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:09:5B |oui_eth=00:09:5B }} {{TagLine|ProSafe 802.11g Wireless Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WG302v1|vs_id=2562}}
"2003.09.01" and "70-510302-05" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. The manual specifies the default SSID as '''NETGEAR'''.
;{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WG302_v1}} :CPU is part # FWIXP422BB
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=365735 Image on the DD-WRT forums] :DD-WRT for these devices requires activation.
==Images== <gallery caption="mirrored images from the DD-WRT forum post above"> File:WG302v1.jpg|board top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
